book.synopsis:
Mini-Lessons-Strategies-Activities
Engaging reproducible mini-lessons, strategies, and activities for teaching how to identify persuasive words, analyze ads and commercials, direct writing to a specific audience, and write persuasive editorials, letters, and job applications. Plus great ideas for writing and giving speeches!
book.dimensions: Height: 11 Inches, Length: 8.75 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
